hero.headline: Real Estate Transactions, Simplified.
hero.subtext: CourtierPro is the all-in-one platform for Quebec real estate brokerages — manage transactions, documents, appointments, and client relationships from one place.

features.title: Everything You Need to Close Deals
features.subtitle: Purpose-built tools for Quebec real estate professionals.

transactions.title: Transaction Management
transactions.desc: Track every deal from offer to closing with a clear, stage-by-stage workflow.

documents.title: Document Handling
documents.desc: Upload, organize, and securely share all transaction documents in one place.

appointments.title: Appointment Scheduling
appointments.desc: Coordinate property visits and client meetings without the back-and-forth.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.desc: Monitor your portfolio performance and generate reports with real-time data.

forYou.title: Built for Brokers and Their Clients

broker.title: For Brokers
broker.desc: Stay on top of every transaction, manage your client roster, track document checklists, and get the insights you need to grow your business.

client.title: For Clients
client.desc: Follow the progress of your transaction in real time, access your documents anytime, and stay connected with your broker throughout the process.
